super.title: Main Prizes
super.des: The main prizes will be drawn using a live random number generator among all participants of the promotion every 2 weeks. On the 8th week of the promotion, the main prize will be drawn - a BYD car. The greater the number of accumulated chances, the higher the probability of becoming the winner of the main prizes

wheel.title: Wheel of Fortune
wheel.title2: Spin the wheel of fortune and get guaranteed prizes!
wheel.des: You can spin the wheel once a week and every time your friends have signed up with your promo code.
